textAfterTable: hackerspaces other hackerspace requests that I (sadly) couldn't fit into this trip: city space link BE: Genk FablabGenk http://www.fablabgenk.be NL: Arnhem Hack42 https://hack42.nl/ NL: Den Haag RevSpace https://revspace.nl EE: forming hackerspace Two different workshops that Mitch can give on this Workshop Tour 1)   Variety of kits -- all ages, all skill levels, about 3 hours, kit prices range from €10 to €30 (see below for kits and prices). More info:          https://www.noisebridge.net/wiki/Circuit_Hacking_Mondays 2)   Arduino For Total Newbies -- all skill levels, about 4 hours, €35 (plus optional €10 programming/communications cable). More info:          http://cornfieldelectronics.com/downloads/tvbg_arduino/tvbg_arduino_workshop.htm Items Items that Mitch will have on his Workshop Tour: price name description €15 TV-B-Gone keychain turn off TVs in public places! €15 TV-B-Gone kit turn off TVs in public places at 50 meters away!
